1.title: Hello, Baby!
1.plot: Everyone celebrates Anne's cancer remission in true trailer park fashion. Jared and Chelsea make their return to Myrtle Beach with their newest family member in tow. And Amanda hosts a mysterious guest inside the trailer.

2.title: Jared Gets a Big Boy Job
2.plot: To support his young family, Jared gets in over his head working at a used car lot. Amanda is involved in a love triangle with Brock and a new suitor. And the park buzzes with speculation as Bandit might be dating a familiar foe to Myrtle Manor.

3.title: Trailer Park Secrets
3.plot: Bandit's dirty little secret is out and Becky is livid. Amanda's new live-in boyfriend causes stress in an already cramped trailer. And in an effort to help Kim find love, Marvin and Anne take her to a church speed-dating event.

4.title: Full Moonshine
4.plot: Tensions flare in Amanda's trailer, forcing her roommates to spend the night under the stars. Jared tries to spice up his marriage planning a romantic evening with Chelsey. Finally, Cecil makes a divisive executive decision about the park.

5.title: Trailer Park Boss
5.plot: Much to Becky's dismay, Roxy joins Myrtle Manor. Amanda's attempt to make up with Chelsey with a birthday BBQ goes awry. And, friendships are tested when romance blossoms between Jessica and Brock.

6.title: Manor Meltdown
6.plot: Roxy schemes up a plan to gain the residents respect. Marvin and Anne start to question their future together. And the love triangle between Brock, Jessica and Britney gets more complicated when he moves into the trailer in their front yard.

7.title: Trailer Park Birthday
7.plot: The whole trailer park pitches in to make Miss Peggy's 80th birthday unforgettable, including treating her to a makeover and male dancers. Gina becomes irritated with Roy's frequent absences from Tangulls. Amanda comes up with a new idea to make money.

8.title: We're Gonna Rock This Park
8.plot: The trailer park gets ready to rock when Roxy throws a concert starring the Bandit, but Becky isn't happy about the plan. The growing romance between Brock and Jessica is threatened when he drunkenly kisses her best friend.

9.title: Now Will You Marry Me?
9.plot: Becky's attempt to get Roxy fired backfires and Cecil gives Roxy more power in the trailer park. Marvin gears up for a second proposal to Anne. Jessica and Brittney hatch a plan to get back at Brock for his two timing ways.

10.title: We Oughta Be Commited
10.plot: Becky is at her wits end when Roxy announces her plan to remove her beloved pool and replace it with more trailers. The guys throw Marvin a bachelor party, and the ladies of Myrtle Manor get suspicious and decide to crash the party.

1.title: A Five-Star Resort
1.plot: Meet the quirky residents of the Myrtle Manor trailer park as Becky, the park's landlord, attempts to transform this mobile home community into a 5-star resort. To start, Becky opens up a community pool to unify the community.

2.title: All Tangulled Up
2.plot: Landlord Becky finds herself in more trouble when Tangulls, the trailer park beauty salon, is shut down. Meanwhile, things get worse between trailer park lovers Taylor and Jessica, and the wiener girls attempt to save their struggling hotdog business.

3.title: Days of Our Trailer Park Lives
3.plot: The residents of Myrtle Manor have a spirited debate surrounding a discovery in Taylor and Jessica's trailer. Meanwhile, Jared finds a job at a local putt-putt course, and the Weiner Girls' newest roommate Amanda moves into the trailer park.

4.title: Trouble in Weiner-dise
4.plot: In the wake of Taylor and Jessica's split, tensions are at an all-time high in Myrtle Manor. Lindsey butts heads with Amanda throwing the Wiener Girls into turmoil. Meanwhile, after her cat suddenly falls ill the community shows their support for Anne.

5.title: Queen of the Trailer Park
5.plot: Following the Wiener Girl's fistfight, Becky comes up with an idea to bring the trailer park back together: the first ever "Miss Myrtle Manor" beauty pageant! With Roy and Gina at the helm, who will be crowned queen of the trailer park?

6.title: Unhitched
6.plot: With Cecil on vaction, Becky takes a mental vacation of her own. Will Bandit take advantage, slipping out of the park without paying rent? And when Chelsey comes to Jared's aid after a motorcycle crash, will their relationship motor into high gear?

7.title: Investigations and Altercations
7.plot: Becky is in hot water with her daddy Cecil when things go awry at a community yard sale forcing Cecil to make some surprising changes at the trailer park. Meanwhile, Marvin wraps up his mattress investigation and announces the culprit in a town meeting.

8.title: Bogged Down in Love
8.plot: When a troublemaker wreaks havoc at the park's "Chicken Bog" cook-off, it's Becky that saves the day. Meanwhile, Jared and Chelsey continue to grow closer, but in an effort to be a better boyfriend, Jared decides he needs a job that pays more money.

9.title: Where There's Smoke, There's Jared
9.plot: Fed up and ready to retire, Cecil gets serious about selling off Myrtle Manor. Meanwhile, Jared decides Chelsey is the love of his life and makes plans for a special trailer park surprise. And Taylor invites Bandit back to the park.

10.title: My Big Fat Trailer Park Wedding
10.plot: With Myrtle Manor sold to a local developer, Becky realizes that Jared and Chelsey's wedding could be her last chance to throw a major blow out event. Meanwhile, Chelsey's pre-wedding bliss is brought crashing down when she learns her family can't attend.

1.title: Something's Fishy in the Manor
1.plot: When Becky is put in charge of Myrtle Manor, she's tested by another trailer park claiming to be the best. Jared investigates why Chelsey is lying and how she is paying the bills. Things don't go as planned when Amanda organizes their July 4th party.

2.title: The Handyman Can
2.plot: Bandit wants to move back into the trailer park. Becky hires a handyman and Amanda is smitten. Marvin investigates whether a resident is conducting illegal activities out of her trailer. A deejay visits the park to see if it's the best in Myrtle Beach.

3.title: Doublewide Pride
3.plot: Amanda tries to get in shape to catch Brock's eye. Marvin tries to figure out who's been stealing Miss Peggy's panties. Roy wants to hire a masseuse for Tangulls. The radio station announces the winner of the #1 trailer park in Myrtle Beach contest.

4.title: May the Horse Be with You
4.plot: To cut down on the rash of pranks against Myrtle Manor, Marvin decides to patrol by horse. Jared seeks help from others with Chelsey's snoring problem but winds up getting booted out of his trailer. Amanda organizes a girls night out.

5.title: Peggy Get Your Gun
5.plot: The Silver Bullet trailer vanishes and Myrtle Manor seeks revenge on the rival trailer park. When Jared tries to take Chelsey on a honeymoon, Marvin and Bandit crash their party. Amanda goes on a date with a stud that has all of the trailer park talking.

6.title: A Pain in the Gas
6.plot: Rival trailer park managers Becky and Roxy decide to settle the score once and for all with a stock car race. Jared and Chelsey get a test run at parenthood. Amanda's budding romance with a Village Creek resident makes her public enemy #1 to Becky.

7.title: Star Spangled Manor
7.plot: Jared books a gig to play the National Anthem at a baseball game. Amanda signs Miss Peggy up for online dating and Peggy decides to go on her first date in years-with Kim tagging along as her "bodyguard." Marvin has a break in his rat investigation.

8.title: The Dark Night Rises
8.plot: A power outage plunges Myrtle Manor into darkness, causing the residents to bond. While Brittany's romance with Brock ramps up, so does her tension with Amanda. Bandit concocts his next money making idea. Anne gets some devastating news about her health.

9.title: To Catch a Rat
9.plot: Marvin believes he's solved the mystery of the Myrtle Manor rat. Jared lands a music gig and uses his payday to buy Chelsey a gift. Amanda and Brittany come to a breaking point, and throw down trailer park style. Anne faces cancer head on.

10.title: Let the Trailer Park Games Begin
10.plot: Myrtle Manor and Village Creek settle the number #1 trailer park debate by competing in the "Trailer Park Games." Roy and Gina plan to surprise Miss Peggy for her 80th Birthday. Amanda decides she's moving, while Jared and Chelsey contemplate parenthood.

imdb.title: Welcome to Myrtle Manor
plot: Reality series surrounding the owner & quirky residents of a trailer park in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina.::The SHZA
